response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and potentially increase your revenue by substantial margins. Given its unique features and market positioning, this product is valued at $1,500,000. Considering its immense value and the benefits it can bring to your company, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1500000}
